original_title: Dedans Le Sud de la Louisiane
overview: Dedans le Sud de la Louisiane, shot in 1972, may very well be the best documentary on Louisianaâ€™s French music and culture ever produced. Bruneau obviously fell in love with the French-speaking people of South Louisiana and their world, and that love is apparent in every frame of this film.
title: Dedans Le Sud de la Louisiane
